医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
TGF-β 通路中的血液生物标志物可识别隐藏的肝癌风险2023 年 2 月 5 日，《Genes & Cancer》发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“TGF-β 通路中基于机制的血液蛋白质组标记物对肝硬化患者患肝细胞癌的风险进行了分层”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Blood-biomarkers-in-TGF-ceb2-pathway-identify-hidden-liver-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Blood-biomarkers-in-TGF-ceb2-pathway-identify-hidden-liver-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98721ce9-ac50-4e23-bc4d-bf0a801dc28a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 23:14:44 -0500 Blood biomarkers in TGF-β pathway identify hidden liver cancer risk
动脉阻断加手术为减少脑血肿患者再次手术带来希望根据今天发表的初步最新科学成果，与单独进行手术引流相比，注射一种物质来阻塞供给硬脑膜（大脑周围的保护袋）的动脉，并进行手术清除积血，可以降低患者需要重复手术的风险。美国中风协会 2024 年国际中风会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Blocking-artery-plus-surgery-offers-hope-for-reducing-reoperations-in-brain-hematoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Blocking-artery-plus-surgery-offers-hope-for-reducing-reoperations-in-brain-hematoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52855f43-0072-4337-b607-74f648f1020d Fri, 09 Feb 2024 23:09:32 -0500 Blocking artery plus surgery offers hope for reducing reoperations in brain hematoma patients
研究发现髋关节手术中的机器人和导航技术不会增加感染风险《骨与关节外科杂志》上的一项研究表明，对于接受全髋关节置换术 (THA) 的患者，使用机器人辅助手术和手术导航技术与假体周围感染 (PJI) 风险增加无关。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Robotic-and-navigation-technology-in-hip-surgery-dont-raise-infection-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Robotic-and-navigation-technology-in-hip-surgery-dont-raise-infection-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc03a4a5-baa0-4f13-bf73-330b290e6ad8 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:58:10 -0500 Robotic and navigation technology in hip surgery don't raise infection risk, study finds
研究表明，对于在线寻求前列腺癌信息的黑人患者来说，代表权很重要美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊《泌尿学杂志》三月号上的一项研究报告称，对于患有前列腺癌的黑人男性来说，种族代表性是影响对提供前列腺癌信息的网站的信任度的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Representation-matters-to-Black-患者-seeking-prostate-cancer-information-online-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Representation-matters-to-Black-病人-seeking-prostate-cancer-information-online-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12bfeb9f-a858-48d0-b68e-1f850f5309ec Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:48:55 -0500 Representation matters to Black patients seeking prostate cancer information online, study shows
研究显示长期新冠对女性性生活的隐性影响从工作到学校再到社交，COVID-19 几乎影响了我们生活的方方面面，现在波士顿大学的研究表明，卧室里发生的事情也受到了影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-shows-long-COVIDs-hidden-effect-on-womens-sex-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-shows-long-COVIDs-hidden-effect-on-womens-sex-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f332cc61-a82c-4a5f-992d-3dbc88a5cd6a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:42:30 -0500 Study shows long COVID's hidden effect on women's sex lives
新研究显示戒烟对健康有巨大益处根据多伦多大学研究人员在多伦多联合健康中心的一项新研究，戒烟的人在短短几年后预期寿命就会显着延长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/New-study-shows-dramatic-health-benefits-of-quitting-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/New-study-shows-dramatic-health-benefits-of-quitting-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=333bd224-da3d-41f4-a148-88591e36267d Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:41:18 -0500 New study shows dramatic health benefits of quitting smoking
IPIAD 增强胰腺导管腺癌的标准治疗2024 年 2 月 7 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“IPIAD-一种增强方案，使用已上市的重新用途药物厄贝沙坦、乙胺嘧啶、伊曲康唑、阿奇霉素和氨苯索，添加到胰腺导管腺癌的标准治疗中” ”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/IPIAD-augments-standard-therapy-for-pancreatic-ductal-adenocarcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/IPIAD-augments-standard-therapy-for-pancreatic-ductal-adenocarcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ac825fd-e452-4f7c-8d8a-0d5387f0e6a8 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:31:22 -0500 IPIAD augments standard therapy for pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma
营养表观遗传学教育减少自闭症和多动症儿童父母的超加工食品摄入量在 PubMed 最近发布的一份出版物中，由食品成分与健康研究所的 Dufault 博士领导的美国科学家报告了一项临床试验的结果，在该试验中，接受营养表观遗传学教育的父母显着减少了超加工食品的消费，同时增加了超加工食品的摄入量。他们摄入全食和/或有机食品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Nutritional-epigenics-education-reduces-ultra-processed-food-intake-in-parents-of-children-with-autism-and-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Nutritional-epigenics-education-reduces-ultra-processed-food-intake-in-parents-of-children-with-autism-and-ADHD.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=652ecd53-9fc1-4bfc-9eee-57422312bc78 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:25:07 -0500 Nutritional epigenetics education reduces ultra-processed food intake in parents of children with autism and ADHD
阿尔茨海默病患者血液中的免疫系统被发现发生表观遗传改变西北医学的一项新研究发现，阿尔茨海默病患者血液中的免疫系统发生了表观遗传改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Immune-system-in-the-blood-of-Alzheimers-病人-found-to-be-epigenically-altered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Immune-system-in-the-blood-of-Alzheimers-病人-found-to-be-epigenically-altered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11393106-1fdb-459c-9aa8-b9143c837b24 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:19:05 -0500 Immune system in the blood of Alzheimer's patients found to be epigenetically altered
小型超声波贴纸可监测内脏器官的硬度麻省理工学院的工程师开发了一种小型超声波贴纸，可以监测身体深处器官的硬度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Small-ultrasound-sticker-can-monitor-the-stiffness-of-internal-organs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Small-ultrasound-sticker-can-monitor-the-stiffness-of-internal-organs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b83f83a-1602-4481-a9c9-684f12964f18 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 22:13:13 -0500 Small ultrasound sticker can monitor the stiffness of internal organs
